header.description: Optional arguments to provide when creating a DDS image from another format.

content.name: maxMipMaps
content.description:
The maximum number of mipmaps to generate for a DDS image. This must be an integer between 1 and 15. If not provided, it is 15 by default.

This value includes the largest, highest-quality version of the image. To avoid scaling down the image at all, use a value of 1.

content.name: shuffle
content.description: Whether or not the resulting DDS image should be shuffled. If true, the DDS image will use DST5 compression. If false, it will use DXT5 compression. If not provided, it is false by default.
